text: Dixie Jane D'Amelio (born August 12, 2001) is an American social media personality and singer. She is known for her videos on the social media platform TikTok. D'Amelio is the older sister of Charli D'Amelio. == Career == D'Amelio's career began after her sister Charli gained popularity on TikTok. Dixie D'Amelio also began posting on TikTok. She is the 7th most-followed individual on TikTok. In 2020, she starred in the YouTube web series Attaway General. D'Amelio's acting career includes appearing on the Brat TV series Attaway General. D'Amelio released her first single, "Be Happy" in 2020. The song has received more than 55.6 million streams on Spotify. She signed a record deal with L.A. Reid's label HitCo Entertainment. Forbes published a report in August 2020 revealing D'Amelio earned $2.9 million in the last year through June from loads of her sponsorship deals and merchandise, making her the third highest-earning TikTok star. D'Amelio released her second single, "One Whole Day" with Wiz Khalifa. ==References== Category:People from Norwalk, Connecticut Category:Living people Category:2001 births Category:American TikTokers Category:American YouTubers Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:Singers from Connecticut Category:American bloggers Category:Musicians from Connecticut
title: Dixie D'Amelio
